title: Path traversal using symlink
content:

Impact

steps: Run statics-server in the desired directory
Create a symlink inside the project directory: ln -s /etc/passwd passwdsym
Access the symlinked file via curl: curl localhost:8080/passwdsym
vuln_description: The vulnerability is a path traversal issue in statics-server (version 0.0.9) that allows an attacker to read arbitrary files on the server by exploiting symbolic links. By creating a symlink to sensitive files (like /etc/passwd) within the served directory, an attacker can access these files through the web server.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it involves a common security anti-pattern (not resolving symlinks safely) and requires no complex interactions or state manipulation. The attack vector is well-known and the steps to reproduce are simple and linear.
